##Problem 8.2

a. 

```{r}
ggplot(data = CPS85,aes(x = age, y = wage)) + geom_point(data = CPS85,aes(shape = married)) + facet_wrap(~sector)
```

b. 

```{r}
layer_1 <- ggplot2(data = CPS85,aes(x = age, y = wage)) + geom_point() + facet_wrap(~married) 
layer_2 <- facet_wrap(~sex)

layer_1 + layer_2
```
